column4: Hi there, I have a problem with epiphany browser. It is very slow: it grays out as it is going to crash but then it comes back. (It might be somewhat related to flash...) Any ideas?
have you tried running it from the command line to see what messages might be shown?
could you walk me through how to do that
close epiphany, then open a terminal (Ctrl-Alt-T) and type 'epiphany'
when the slowdowns happen, check the terminal to see if there are error messages present
